replies.author: 小乐_too
replies.txt_content:
下载1.7.10 Shaders Mod v2.3.29,光影核心需要用压缩文件打开jar解压ShadersModCore
Shaders Mod: https://www.minecraftforum.net/f ... updated-by-karyonix
如果只是光影的话Optifine在较新的版本内已经整合shader了
Optifine官网:https://www.optifine.net/home
 或者是GLSL Shaders Mod:https://www.minecraftforum.net/f ... or-minecraft-1-7-10
